title: Please, Don’t See Me - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Disabilities   Flashbacks   Long Separations   Lovers Reunited   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Poor to Rich   Rich to Poor   Short Story   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Unconditional Love
author: Wei Feng Ji Xu   微风几许
description:
Shu Jin was afraid of Sheng Xinghe's gaze falling on him.

He was also afraid that Sheng Xinghe's world will never have him in it again.>
